page.title: 15CROOKWOOD MILL FARM
page.content: THIS FARM IS RUN BY THE FARMER, HIS WIFE HIS PARENTS AND A PERSON ON THE YOUTH TRAINING SCHEME. THE FARM IS 76 HECTARES IN SIZE. IT CONSISTS OF A FARMHOUSE, A MILLHOUSE, DAIRY ROOM AND MILKING PARLOUR. THERE ALSO A DUTCH BARN, TWO CALF PENS AND THREE BARN TYPE SHELTERS IN THE YARD. THE LAND IS ALL GRASSLAND AND DIVIDED INTO 12 FIELDS. THESE FIELDS PLUS ANIMAL FOODSTUFF SUPPORT A HERD OF 80 MILKING PEDIGREE JERSEY COWS. THERE ARE AKSO A FEW FREE RANGE CHICKENS AND THREE SHEEP USED TO KEEP THE HOME LAWNS CUT. YOGHURT, CREAM, SOMETIMES CHEESE AND BUTTER ARE MADE ON THE FARM AND WITH MILK ARE SOLD FROM THE FARM. MILK IS COLLECTED DAILY BY A TANKER FROM THE MILK MARKETING BOARD.
